# Introducción

## Sistemas de graficación

- Visualización estática:
    - `graphics`
    - `lattice`
    - `ggplot2`
    - `ggviz`
- Visualización interactiva:
    - `plotly`
    - `rgl`
    - `dygraphs`
    - `leaflet`
    - `taucharts`
    - `metricsgraphics`
    - `highcharter`
    - `echarts4r`

# Visualización estática

## `graphics`

```{r, eval=TRUE}
with(cars, scatter.smooth(speed, dist, pch = 18, col = "dodgerblue4",
               lpars = list(col = "red3", lwd = 2)))
grid(col = "gray80")
```

## `lattice`

```{r, eval = TRUE}
library(lattice)
xyplot(dist ~ speed, data = cars, type = c("p", "smooth"), pch = 18,
       grid = TRUE, col = "dodgerblue4", col.line = "red3", lwd = 2)
```

## `ggplot2`

<img src="https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcS5GbE9z6urbtMwA9i1UiXcUOizIZLwVrx4mTZ84B_YKCrzS6Ia&s" style="position:absolute;top:0px;right:30px; width:80px" />

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
cars %>% 
  ggplot(data = ., aes(x = speed, y = dist)) +
  geom_point(pch = 18, size = 2, color = "dodgerblue4") +
  geom_smooth(se = FALSE, color = "red3", method = "loess", span = 2/3) +
  theme_light()
```
